attributes.action: Change child maintenance so it's fair for the child and father
attributes.background:
Currently the system is a flat steep rate, further more the father is charged 16% more to collect it than the mother who only received a 4% charge.

With no evidence needed that the mother spends the maintenance on maintaining the child's up bringing.

Make the charges fair and liveable

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly how you would like the child maintenance system to be changed.
